field.name: folder
field.label: Folder
field.description: The folder where you want to store your RSS Feed, from the root folder (the root folder is the folder where your Wordpress wp-config.php file located in). For example: /feed/. Make sure it is writable.

field.name: filename
field.label: Filename
field.description: The filename for your RSS Feed. For example: latest.rss

field.name: feed_title
field.label: RSS Feed Title
field.description: Leave blank to use your Wordpress site Title.

field.name: feed_description
field.label: RSS Feed Description
field.description: Leave blank to use the Wordpress site description.

field.name: items_number
field.label: Items number
field.description: The number of items show in the RSS feed
